# Introduction {-}

## Prerequisites {-}

There are no prerequisites for this class and is especially friendly for non-programmers! So if you have no programming experience at all, worry not! We'll make sure to make the information easy to follow along, or at the least make sure you know where to look for an answer when you are stuck.

## What to expect? {-}

All the information for this course is taken from the book *R for Data Science* [@Wickham2017R].
